name: 楊景德
objective: The course investigates several key aspects of the human mind from different angles: Mental models, Presence, Decision, Mind Reading, Choice,  Courage, Perseverance, Emotions, Intuition, Self-Analysis, Subconscious, Insight, Willpower, etc. .  To achieve the goal, we shall discuss these topics and issues on the following subjects: Neuroscience, Psychology, Philosophy, Neurobiology, Sociology, etc.  The lecturing shall proceed from reading texts to practicing subjects and methods.   We may watch some relevant films and movies in the class if time allows.
